concept.title: Logs
concept.shortdesc: Log files to help you see activity for usage, access, report suites, and Admin changes.

section.title: Admin Log
section.p: The admin log reports all changes made by administrators in admin tools. The log provides a gateway to user-defined reports from any of the three logs. You can search for events matching your selected criteria over a specified date range.

section.title: Usage and Access Log
section.p: The Usage and Access Log lets you evaluate report usage at the user account level.

row.entry: Specify a date range filter. You can enter a date manually in the format YYYY-MM-DD or click the Calendar icon to select a date.
Filter the log by user name.
Filter the log by an IP address.
Filter the log by a specific report suite ID.
Filter the log by an event type. Select an event type from the drop-down list.
Filter the log by a word or phrase in the event description.
Exports the contents of the Usage & Access Log to a tab-delimited file.

section.title: Report Suite Change Log
section.p: The Report Suite Change log displays changes made to your report suites outside of admin.
Tools that can modify a report suite from outside the Admin Tools include:

ul.li: SAINT uploads made in a web browser (SAINT uploads made via FTP are not included in the change log)
Changes made by an account representative or Customer Care using internal tools

row.entry: Specify a date range filter. You can enter a date manually in the format YYYY-MM-DD or click the Calendar icon to select a date.
Filter the log by company name.
Filter the log by user name.
Filter the log by an IP address.
Filter the log by a word or phrase in the event description.
Exports the contents of the Usage & Access Log to a tab-delimited file.
